alert.note: Alert for Butte; Lawrence (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 3:49PM MDT until May 27 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Butte County in northwestern South Dakota... Northern Lawrence County in west central South Dakota... East central Crook County in northeastern Wyoming... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 348 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles southeast of Aladdin, or 14 miles west of Belle Fourche, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Belle Fourche, Belle Fourche Reservoir, Fruitdale and Arpan. This includes... Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 1 and 27. Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 198 and 207. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
